in.com.app

Class AppMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • in.com.app.AppMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplayLayout

    public class AppMain
extends Activity
implements IDisplayLayout
    Version:
    1.0 This is the Main class where registration is processed and layout is downloaded. IpAddress, MacId, Location, Network Type, Network Status information is fetched.
    Author:
    Ravi@Xvidia Technologies
